content.detailedDescription:
I was cooking a steak and i was sitting in the patio chair, i was watching two stars, one  star was brighter than the other one right? i was watching the brighter star. it was making some iratic moves.  like up down sideways very fast, around the dimmer star. i thought it was a commet, then a sattlite. maybe a plane?

i actually saw a plane fly under it.  i dont think it was that . it freaked me out. because i was watching it for 5 mins. no repeated moves, then all of the sudden it took form, it connected the bright star to the dim star, and it was moving east!It was not triangle shape. i thought it was a stealth blimp but that changed my mind on it.  i tried to show my  friend 1 friend saw one star moving.  
 
i watched it again, the bright star was circling around the dimmer star real fast and it disapeared into the dimmer star! i saw another star on the right that was also kinda dim, it wint into the dim star!! i was freakinng out.. i dont know what that is. i know for sure that wasnt the space station!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It looked like a sattlelight at first, but it was moving and it was somehow connected to another star.

content.detailedDescription: Typical july 4th evening with fireworks lighting the sky so at first i thought nothing of the lights.  however, these lights were different.  they were much higher in the sky and traveled along the horizon from south to north in a straight line.  as each object got to a particular point they would slow down then disappear to the east.  there were a total of five orange balls with the first three closer to each other than the last two.  there was no flashing or pulsing in the lights just a large (though they could have been miles away) orange glowing light.  i remained outside for about thirty minutes afterward but no other objects were sighted.
content.summary: 5 orange spheres heading south to north west of orlando, fl.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside at around 10:30 in the evening facing north and looking at the big dipper when i noticed a very large star-like object that started moving slowly across the sky in a linear fashion going from west to east. it was basically at the same altitude or lower as a passenger jet, which fly over my house all the time since i live approximately 60 miles south of the ottawa airport. i know that passenger jets have flashing red and white lights but this didn't have any. i called my boyfriend outside to look so that i would have another witness. two friends of mine that live about 3 miles from me also said that they saw the same thing and agree that it definately was not an airplane. after a couple of minutes the object flew into some clouds (not above them) and then we couldn't see it any more. i honestly don't know what it was and was actually quite surprised when i saw it. it basically looked like a very large star, brighter than the surrounding stars.
content.summary: Looked like a very large bright star moving from west to east

content.detailedDescription:
I have been encouraged by two mufon members to submit this sighting. i am now a ufo researchjer but was not prior to the event. i have copied and pasted this article over from my notes. it also includes severe long term after effects. i haven't been back to wales since it happened but will soon to take photos so i can mark on the horizon where it was first observed and it's flight path over to us. also a mufon member has offered to make a 3d cg film of the event so you will be able to see what happened. i am ready to have hypnotic regression now and also would take a lie detector rest without prior notice.

it was october the 4th 1996. my partner (at the time) "s", myself and my son had arranged to go to wales for the weekend. we'd hired a cottage in glyn ciriog and invited his sister "d" and her son "j" and their uncle "jn" along too. most mundane details have gone from my mind now, the journey there and the daytime on friday. i can remember walking to the shop with the kids and "s" and "d" and not feeling too good. i was edgy and irritated by "d" from some reason i have forgotten now. 
my next memory is it's nighttime, well it's dark, it could have been anytime really but we were all in the garden sorting wood out for the fire. i can remember this because we had a particularly large part of a tree we were jumping on to try and snap it but all that happened is we bounced off it, it was funny and we made a game out of it for a while.
we must have had some food by this time and i remember going upstairs to unpack my things, i was in the bedroom with my bag on the bed when "s" started shouting me. it sounded urgent and the kids were screaming and so i thought something was wrong and ran downstairs. i found "j" and my son louis just playing about, relieved i turned to "s" and asked what was wrong.
he ushered me outside to a wall on our right and pointed out into the sky and said "look at that". i looked, all i could see for miles was thick dark cloud, he kept insisting and eventually i saw a tiny flicker of light. i said "it's lightning" he replied "no it's not keep watching" as i looked on it happened again, then again and again. it was just a little flicker in the clouds which repeated itself over and over. by now it was obvious that it had a uniformed pattern to the way it was lighting up. we called everyone else out after a little while and we stood and watched.
i've no idea how long we were there until it stated to get bigger and we realized it was coming our way. it didn't just zoom over to us in a straight line, it kind of zigzagged, like it was following the contours of a valley or river maybe. but sure enough it moved to us at a steady pace. by this time we were all excited, i'm not sure what the children thought was going on. eventually it was above the field directly in front of the house and we'd moved up the garden by now. it was a spectacular sight. we couldn't see the actual craft because it was in the clouds but i remember thinking how low they were. this object was only a couple of hundred feet at most above us. it had a large round central light which was blue ish white and had lines of light that were rotating coming from the middle to the outer edge which also was lit but they were rotating in opposite directions. it looked like the underneath of a mushroom but through the clouds the lights were rippling and gave it the effect of being almost like a jelly fish. the lights in the cloud made them look like mashed potato, highlighting the different densities of the clouds. i seem to remember noticing a red light above the white lights but i'm not 100% sure on that point now.
i can remember us all stood as a group in front of a small hedge that bordered the field that was in front of the house, to our left was a small wall and behind us there was a patch of ground with a chain linked fence bordering the property, behind the chain linked fence was a small copse of trees. as we stood there watching the craft moved over and was hanging directly above us. "s" had gone into the house to ring our housemates mark and "jn" to tell them but there was no one in so he left a message on the answer phone and came back out. while "s" was on the phone i'd noticed that the sheep in the field in front of us were all lying down and were quiet. i don't remember hearing any external noises at all. not even a hum from the craft above us.... just silence apart from our excited chatter.
as we stood there something made me turn and look behind me. behind the chain linked fence there was another object, it was maybe 25 feet high and was a sphere. it was shrouded in a swirling mist and pulsed a grey ish white light... on... off every other second or so. i turned to everyone and said "ooh look there's another one" and everyone turned around, looked at it and said "oh yeah" with mild interest then promptly started looking straight back up at the one above us. it was gone from our minds instantly. at no point did anyone think "oh [cms/tg/pd]! they've landed"!!! 
i can remember standing with the hedge in front of me and my son to my right, we'd tried to tell the kids that there was nothing to worry about, the lights were from a tractor and were reflecting off the bottom of the clouds. this might have worked for a while.. but not for long. my son suddenly started tugging on my clothes and i looked at him, he was terrified. he said with his little ashen face and really wide eyes "mummy, mummy, a hand came through the hedge and touched my foot. it was not my imagination... i saw it with my eyes"! still nothing registered. i turned to "s" and said, "come on, lets get them in they're getting scared" so off we trotted back to the house to get them inside. 
as soon as we walked through that door everyone just went straight back to being normal... "d" and "jn" went in the living room to watch tv... and "s" started doing the dishes and the kids started playing. i was stood there agog! you'd think we'd just been watching fireworks and the display was over! i said to "s" "i'm going back out" and off i marched right to the bottom of the garden and stood right underneath it. now you would think that the fact that there was a craft on the ground and a hand coming through the hedge would have registered in my head... but it did not. i still can't get my head around that.
so there i am on my own a good hundred yards from the house standing by myself underneath a craft that must have been 60 feet across completely oblivious to the one on the ground behind me, stood in front of the same hedge that a hand had poked through to touch my sons foot. i can remember thinking "ok.. now what"? i was awestruck and was full of wonder and amazement. suddenly i heard something running towards me from my right, the sound was of two feet running quickly... it sounded like when a child runs across their bedroom quickly to grab something after bed time.... whatever it was bumped into me, brushed across my back as it went dragging my jumper with it. i didn't look, i didn't think, i just ran for my life in absolute terror. i can only remember taking three steps and leaping from the raised bit of the garden onto the patio in front of the kitchen door but realistically that would not be possible as i was so far away. i think it's quite safe to say that was blind panic. i shot into the kitchen shivering and shaking and trying to tell "s" without letting the kids hear. he just turned to look at the clock on the cooker and said "well you haven't been out there long so you haven't had any missing time" like it was the most normal thing in the world. 
i was a mess. i made him shut the doors and lock them, close the curtains.. all that last defence stuff even though i knew that didn't make any difference!!! i can remember sitting in the middle of the bed shaking, not daring to even put my feet on the floor in case something was under the bed, i wouldn't even go to the toilet on my own.
i can remember putting the kids to bed and hiding out in the bedroom, i left the door open so i could see the hallway and my sons bedroom door. "s" looked out of the bedroom window once and he didn't say it had gone which he would have if it had, he didn't say anything, he just closed the curtain again. then we went to bed and went to sleep.
the next day was dreadful. everyone was arguing, "d" was screaming at me in the kitchen while i was making some sandwiches, i turned and told her to shut her mouth or else... so she went outside and continued to carry on hysterically at me through the window. "jn" was being foul too. we were all in a state. "jn" and "d" went out in the car with the two boys and me and "s" went for a walk.
we walked into the village and saw someone stood outside the pub so we tentatively asked him if anyone ever saw lights in the sky in the area. he just laughed and said "if you want magic mushrooms they grow in that field over there". we didn't bother asking anyone else. we walked towards a hill we could see in the distance with a solitary gnarly looking tree on it. when we got to the top and looked around there was nothing to see for miles. we were hoping to see a town or anything at all because we thought 2well, maybe it was lasers from the roof of a nightclub or something" hahaha! bloody good lasers if they were. as we stood there i felt something on my leg so i looked to see a massive ginger tom cat rubbing itself on me and purring it's head off! we were in the middle of nowhere! where the hell had the cat come from???? after realizing there was nothing to see we headed back to the house and got out maps. the nearest town was wrexham and that was 16 miles away! 
"jn" and "d" came back and the day grew worse, "s" ended up ringing to book tickets for the coach home, the thought of being in a car with those two was too much to bear. he booked the tickets and a taxi for 4.30 am and we sneaked off and left them there on their own. they'd been so horrible we didn't care, we didn't even leave a note.
in hindsight i can see that this was their reaction to what had happened, but what i couldn't understand was why it was directed at me. my reaction to it was strong. i was terrified all the time. if i wanted to walk into a room and the door was shut i'd bang the door wide open fast so that if anything was hiding behind it i'd knock it senseless. i can also remember running up stairs and realizing the light wasn't on and running back down to switch it on before going back up there again. i couldn't sleep with the light off for years after this.
"s" and i split up after a while, i'd turned into a nervous wreck. i got my own house with my son and started to build a new life. the only problem was, was that i couldn't stop thinking about it. some day's i'd think about it all day. then because i was living on my own i daren't go to bed. i had a small window above the door in my front room and i'd sit looking out of it for hours looking for them... i don't know where i went in my head... i just used to sit and stare. eventually i started to take amphetamines to stay awake all night and would still just look and stare. when my son was with his dad i was out partying all the time, anything to make myself feel good, and not be at home on my own. i took it to the extreme though, lost lots of weight, wouldn't eat... i think deep down i was trying to make myself disappear. no matter how much i tried to distract myself, every single day i saw those lights and heard those footsteps. it's safe to say i lost the plot and nearly lost my son. things got so bad i eventually decided i couldn't cope anymore and my son would be better off with his dad anyway and i took a lot of pills and hoped i'd die. i'd pretty much been hoping i wouldn't wake up ever monday after a heavy weekend. thankfully i did wake up, i made some new friends but was still a mess. one day i found out i was pregnant with my oldest daughter. that was what saved me. i sorted myself out and made a nice home, she was what i needed to keep me from continuing in this death slide on self destruct. my nights were taken up looking after her and i hardly thought about the ufos for a while.
i first talked about this in 2005 on the 25th june..... that was the biggest thing for me. talking to other people about it and them taking me seriously. even though this event terrified me and forced a massive paradigm shift onto me, i would not go back in time and change a thing. actually maybe i would, maybe i'd stand my ground and look around to see what it was that touched me. maybe i missed an opportunity for contact? but then looking back on my life there are many strange memories that i have that seem to make sense to me now. i have a feeling this was not the first time this sort of thing had happened and maybe that's why i wasn't afraid to go back out on my own? somehow though i think that our behaviour that night was modified. not manipulated but just to the point where we weren't afraid. how come we all forgot about the smaller craft on the ground? why didn't the fact that my son saw a hand come through the hedge register as it should have? he told me recently that at first he thought it was part of the hedge moving because it looked like twigs but then as it came forward he saw it was a hand. he suffered terrible panic attacks as a child after this and when i tried to hold him he would say "get off me your fingers are like twigs" and once he scrabbled around on the floor in a panic saying to me " i want my mum, where's my mum, can we go home now, i want to go home" he slept with me a lot because he heard strange noises in his head and felt like he was falling backwards through his bed and if he did he would die. i've had this myself and it's hypnagogia. a common thing for experiencers.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A large disc object came over to us from the distance and hovered overhead. another sphere landed on the ground aprox 20-25 feet behind us. event lasted a couple of hours.

content.detailedDescription: While my sister and i were standing on the front pourch we looked up and noticed what first looked like a really bright airplan with lots of lights it moved across the eastern sky for about 3 min real slow then it shot stright up and dimmed out and looked like a star in orbit of the planet and moved very very slowly until it was out of eyesight.
content.summary: Star like object moving slow across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
my name is jody snyder. i had a ufo experience when i was 8 years old at the time and i am now 35. i am e-mailing to you, because i would to try to find out if there was any other ufo activity reported around the time that i had my sighting. it was in 1982, it was in the late spring, early summer in easton pennsylvania. my sister, uncle and i ad gone for a walk in the early evening and we stopped to rest in a field above the road. as we were laying there i saw this object just hovering above us. i remember feeling very calm and quit comfortable at this sight. i am trying to find away to put into words what the ufo looked like, but i am struggling with it. i have never seen anything described anywhere that looked like what i saw. i have talked to my sister and my uncle and they are trying to remember, but at this moment they can not. all i want is to understand what i saw for myself. it would be greatly appreciated, if your team could help.
thank you for taking the time to read my e-mail.
      
much appreciated,
                                                                            jody snyder
content.summary: Hovering object above field.

content.detailedDescription:
hey ufo hunters, at first i didn't know who to talk to about this until i remembered that you were on the history channel.  i live in quakertown, pa. i'm michelle erdman, age 20.   my mother and i were heading home from eating at a restaurant in perkasie, pa, my father was in another car and did not spot them.  going onto the exit to head north on 309 about a month ago, very sorry i do not remember the date, when i should have logged it down. it was on a tuesday, that i remember. my mom spotted it first and i kept an eye on it while my mother drove.  there were perfectly three aligned bright white objects in the sky, horizontally equal. it was when the sun was setting and the stars could not be seen well enough, but these objects, hovering at a stand still a few miles away approx. they were gone in 5min, with in a flash. 

i asked my father when i got home, because he was in the military and was a helicopter pilot so he knew if it would be a helicopter hovering, but he said that the only way they can do that is if they are landing. i know he believes in extra terrestrial beings, but that heightened our alert.  my mother said that there have been sightings at lake nockamixon, only a 15min drive from where we were at the most. over in revere, pa there is a place called ringing rocks, which is supposedly an odd sight that my have been et workings. but i did not research that thouroughly.  i hope this helps you out. if you have any questions just email me, i will be glad to answer them.
content.summary: Three aligned bright white objects in sky.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to film the sky, and there is a disc object flying around, it appears at 23 sec at the roof of the house moving left to right at a extremely high rate of speed.  and another ufo at 50 sec of the video, watch closely. you might have to watch the video 4 times to see if you have bad eyes..
content.summary: Disc object high speed

content.detailedDescription: At 2130 hrs, on wed. july 15, 09..Temp aprx. 85*slight breeze, when i stepped outside and stood on our deck (nw) looking up into the western sky, i saw a bright light which i thought for a moment was a star though it did not look familiar...I about walked back in the house but stopped when i saw a similar light blinking & heading twoards this one (w)light, the second light stopped at a point to the right of the first one below it. the two lights both now blinked & continuously, then suddenly a third similar light (coming from a south direction)headed in the same direction as the other two.It also stopped below the top one and started blinking, these three lights were stationary and blinking for several seconds looked like a triangle..Then the light on the right(north)started up and passed the light on the left and continued in  the (s) direction the other light just came from.Then the light left below the top one started up and zipped into the direction the previous light had come from in the north,then the top light zipped off into a north east direction. when i say they zipped, they sped, moved fast...Not like air craft we know of like airplane or airliner, helicopter whatever...These objects moved extremely fast when they did move...They continued to blink non stop. it is worthy to note that during this event the dogs in the neighborhood barked the whole time this was going on, my husbands pet bird was twirling around in his cage and making noises like it was scared, our outdoor cat took off again...How did i feel before the experience ?, i was restless, however i thought perhaps at the time it was due to the heat, and being tired.I cannot say how far these objects were, but far enough to say at first they looked like stars, very bright stars, i did not see form or shape other than that.
content.summary: 3 blinking bright lights moving in night sky

content.detailedDescription: Disc shaped object hovering, then shot away at high rate of speed...  no sound...
content.summary: Disc object hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Me and some friends were on the top of a hill in our town. bingham/nottinghamshire. we were looking for shooting stars when a strange object came into sight. it was travelling east and although it appeared to be moving slowly. it must of been very high as it was star size. so in reality it was probly moving quickly. it wasnt a plane because it was too high and it was orange without any flashes. it couldnt of been a chinese lantern as it was far too high and didnt seem to flicker at all.

i would of mistook this object for a satalite or a piece of space junk etc. but there was something very strange about its movement that we couldnt believe. it seemed the be slowing down slightly and then speeding up slightly and also seemed to move from side to side (very minutely) as if it was drunk or something! it did move in a straight path but it seemed to be moving in a gentle irregular fashion. it continued east towards granthem and went out of sight in cloud. no sound seemed to come from the object.

all of this information is 100% true and i would personaly never make a hoax or anything because i am actualy interested in the subject of ufo's and i think hoaxers should be sent to prison! there was five of us that soor it and we were all pretty freaked out by it.

unfortunately we didnt have a good enough camera on us to get an image. it would of took a very good camera to get a decent picture as it was so high.
content.summary: Orange glowing object very very high up. moving quite quickly

content.detailedDescription:
I was sleeping outside at the laguna campground, mt laguna, san diego county, on the night of july 14th, 2009 at approximately 9:50pm (21:50). i don't do drugs of any kind, and though on very rare occasions i have a drink or two, that night i hadn't touched any alcohol.

i was laying on my back on top of a picnic table, near the foot of a very tall pine tree. my feet were pointing east, my head, west (the base of this picnic table is concrete and securely anchored to the ground, lengthwise, in an east to west (or west to east) orientation. it cannot be moved. i was staring straight up stargazing through the openings at the top of the tree. i suddenly felt disoriented, almost dizzy, as if i could feel the rotation of the earth or something. what was actually happening however was that three of the objects i had thought were stars were moving.

they were in a scalene triangle formation (shortest side facing north) and spaced quite far apart. i have no idea how to estimate exactly how far apart they were spaced. if they had been satellites i'd guess the two making up the shortest side of the triangle could have been many miles apart. if they were beyond satellite altitude, they could've been hundreds of miles apart. there's really no way for me to make an estimate. as to their altitude i can only guess. i've seen my share of "satellites" and these seemed at least that high if not higher. they were most definitely higher than any fixed winged aircraft could fly (at least to my knowledge). the were moving more slowly than most satellites i've seen though, and they were moving in that triangle formation in a line that ran from the nnw to sse.

i kept my eyes on them until they were obscured by the denser part of the tree, but i estimated where they might appear again on the other side, and sure enough they eventually appeared again as they cleared the tree. i followed them until they disappeared at just above the horizon. they never altered formation. when i say "disappeared", i'm mean became to dim to see.

there was no sound that i could detect associated with these objects. it was a very calm/peaceful night. i could hear bats above my head using their sonar, it was that quiet. there was no breeze to speak of. all night long i could hear random planes (prop and jet), and helicopters as they'd cross the sky and disappear their sounds fading with them, and distant traffic come and go, as well as people talking in distant campsites from time to time. but most of the time you could hear a pin drop, and i heard nothing coming from these objects.
content.summary: Three, star-like, star-size, objects in a scalene triangle formation, traveling nnw to sse

content.detailedDescription: Shortly after 8:30pm i had a strong feeling that i should go out to look for an evening satellite. the sky still had some evening glow so i was trying to look for stars. i spotted what appeared to be a satellite, like a bright star, moving east to west very high in the sky. i was totally surprised to see a satellite so easily, but it was traveling at the normal speed of the many satellites that i have seen before. suddenly the light turned ninety degrees to the south and sped up to a very high rate of speed before just disappearing. the distance it traveled from first sight to the turn was about one fist width at arms length and after the turn two fist widths moving south. i immediately did the distance measuring after it disappeared. i watched for several minutes more, but it never reappeared.
content.summary: Like a satellite except changed direction of travel

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with my daughter, my wife had just driven off when a white light that had the appearance of a star flew overhead stopped above us and shined a blinding light down on us for about 10 seconds. the light then went south with 3 jets following behind it, they appeared to be chasing the light.  i would estimate the light being 300 feet in the air.  being aware of a previous incident that was reported on mufon from this area, i have been watching the sky at night and noticed a light like this moving way to fast to be a star and too low to the ground to be a satellite on several occasions, but never had it shine a light on us before. i have seen a light like this stop and turn at a 90 degree angle then speed across the sky on several occassions. there have been a lot of jets and airplanes late at night, which i've not noticed before.
content.summary: Star like light low to ground, stopped shined a light down on us

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were in our back yard on the fourth of july focused to the west on a fireworks display a couple of miles away. my wife saw it first as it appeared just above the fireworks we were watching. she thought it was part of the fireworks display until it kept moving towards us and eventually went directly over our house. it was a luminous round orange object that "glowed" and kind of pulsated. never seen anything like it and we were both astonished at what we were seeing. there were no flashing lights and it made no sound whatsoever. it was flying no higher than a small plane and moved slowly. there were other small planes in the area observing the numerous fireworks displays around our area and we could hear their engines. the object traveled from the west in a straight line to the east until we could no longer see it.
content.summary: luminous orange glowing object passed over our house spotted from the western horizon and traveled east in a straight line

content.detailedDescription:
We were on our back deck. husband noticed strange object. object appeared to move within a small space, almost a vibration. like a kid shaking  a flashlight. he then noticed 2 more similar objects nearby the first. they each had more than one light, and more than one color of light. he watched them for a very long time. they gradually moved across the sky in no real pattern.
when he pointed the first object out to me. he said "what the *^#*@ is that?"
i and a friend looked at it. it made me very uncomfortable and both i and my friend went inside the house while my husband continued to observe. he said that he never lost sight of the object. he needed to go to bed.
content.summary: Several lights on each form

content.detailedDescription: Got lost going to pulaski tech for job training deal,down around college station.Saw big fireball with huge streamer going accross sky,bright greenish blue.Probably just a meteor but never heard anyone else seeing it.I would say it was real close to 5:30-5:45 on november 19 or 20th 2008
content.summary: Greenish blue, bright.Probably a big ass meteor.To the west heading north?

content.detailedDescription: I was working at home when i heard some thunders and knew a storm was coming from the sea. i went to the balcony and there were some big white clouds arriving from the south and south-east a storm was under them. so i decided to take my camera and went to the roof, this time willing to capture any ufo nearby, because of the two other experiences i had (one of them posted here earlier, case number:	18100,  and the other one case number:  16319). so i took my camera and took 59 photos in 20 minutes . i returned to my apartment, the rain came some minutes later, and downloaded the pictures to my computer.  and yes, there it was, a strange object in one of the photos. the camera i used was a lumix tmc-tz5 10mpx, the photo was taken within the following parameters: f/3.3 iso100, focal length:28mm, shutter: 1/800 , jpeg.  i am posting the picture number 27 where this object is.
content.summary: Another sphere near storm clouds

content.detailedDescription:
As i was getting out of my car and about to go though the gate at my work i checked the early morning sky as i always do and i spotted a red coloured light moving from west to east. the ufo was approximatly one kilometer away from me and about one thousand feet up, there was no sound coming from it, and no somke trail behind it, the ufo speed was about 100 to 120 kilometer per hour so i got a good look at it, the approximate size of the ufo was about 100 feet across, the brightness of the ufo was the same as the planet venus which was also in the sky at the same time.

my first reaction was cool another ufo that i've seen as this is the second time the i have seen an ufo outside my work place and the 10th ufo that i have seen in my life.

after the ufo disappeared behind the hills to the east of work i felt realy good and happy that i seen another ufo.
content.summary: Red light moving across the sky

content.detailedDescription: While taking photos of the night sky with fellow ufo enthusiest at the dam at lake wildwood a number of strange anomalies came and went. the photo taken was straight over head and the single photo was taken over the tree lines which is of a strange large lit object which broke off the fleet and stayed behind as if it knew we were photographing it. our initial aim was to attempt to get photos of ufos or strange annomalies. we were told this was becoming a hot spot by others who had seen objects in the night sky for the past few months. the images of the fleets was enough to raise the hair on the back of our necks.
content.summary: Fleet of oval spheres and single sphere that stayed longer then 1 min

content.detailedDescription: I tried contacing different ufo's investigations and i'm ignore. now i just join mufon and i will have patience until i have mufons members present to witness this fleet of ufo's that can be seen by the naked eye on any clear night. last summer i tried communicated with one alien of one ufo and the alien litely laser me on my face as i sat down on my folding chair on the beach on jamaica bay howard beach queens new york 11414 near where i live adjacent jfk intntr airport. i spoke to this alien for about an hour then i went home nothing happen. the next day in the morning while i was lying in bed the alien litely laser me on my leg i'm not and i don't anyonewho is familiar to communicate with super-intelligince so my reading so much on the internet of aliens of being either friendly or vicious i just became leary and didn't continue to communicate. so now that why i became a mufon member i like to know if their are any members that can help me to communicate with this fleet of aliens ships that have a changing of the guard on every clear night sky flying out to the east like right over the atlantic ocean. i almost can't wait to have other members witness this happening. i guess i have to put in a report from every clear night that i view these ufo's until other mufons members verify my sightings thank you all for reading this and seeing is believeing witness on any clear night sky all these aliens ships. their follow me up and down the atlantic coastline. the first time i spotted the ufo was in broad daylight a couple of years ago it few by my lights on and off. i had another experience when i came back from atlantic city n.J. this ufo just turn its light off and was hovering quietly right over a shopping mall as i was coming out of a pizza joint after i got the bus from a.C.N.J. i just stood in the parking lot looking at the saucer with the lights turn off and no noise for about a minute then went i started to move it move very slow but it was noticable about one to two thousand feet elevation and about the same distance from me. i didn't know what to do so i retire because i know these ufo's are on to me and i'll be seeing them for life it seems. its was obvious a ufo the first time i saw it it flew very low to be identified. i explain number four i don't know how to explain question no. five we live in a dangerous world and content.summary: I have a fleet of ufo's following me for years and i spoke to linda moulton howe and she thinks i'm incredible she does not refer me to no one in my locality i try spi-ny that are base here in new york city and their not thrill of investigating my situati

content.detailedDescription: Well my mother and i were watching the history channel, a show about ufos (how ironic), and my mom went to brush her teeth. she called out to me and said "there it is again!" i went into the kitchen and looked out the window with my mom. i watched it's movements so close to make sure it wasn't a star or a satellite. the more i stared at it the more it would dance. it was really bright and when it came close i could see it's cheveron shape. it would come close then go away. my mom went to go tell my dad and i stood there in awe. the animals around the house were going crazy. my mom returned and we stared at it for about 30 minutes later. she told me to go to sleep so i layed down and she retired to her room. i stared out the window about 20 minutes later and it moved north about a mile from where it was. i watched it until i got to freaked out to watch it. so i turned away and went to sleep with the thought of signs in my head.
content.summary: It was dancing in the sky and it wasn't a satellite or a star

content.detailedDescription:
Uro report filed 
incident: 7/11/09

sometime before 23:00 i walked out on my deck on the hills facing the sf bay in sausalito and saw directly above me 2, then 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, or more diffuse/transaparent orbs/spheres/balls of light in the sky. they were diffuse balls of light zooming at very high speeds in circle formations that would intersect/criss-cross making the overall pattern look like figure eights in some places. also some of these orbs were popping in and out of my view in patterns of movements that were in shorter duration and appeared to me as not moving in circles. however i had the thought that these orbs were further away from me and i was only seeing one end of their trajectory or path. when i would shift my focus to the whole sky rather than trying to follow a couple of the orbs i then noticed that there were many more balls of light zipping all over the sky.  

last night was a beautiful night with a light cloud cover, patches of clear sky and stars peeking through. all day the clouds over the bay were unusual, multi colored, and diverse formations, several rainbows appeared in the late afternoon, early evening. a summer thunderstorm was trying to express itself. a few drops fell. it felt like a hawaii day and night. i often go outside at night to look over the sf bay and up at the stars.

as i was watching the orbs/spheres last night i wondered if they were absorbing energy from the clouds. the phenomenon stopped when the cloud cover dispersed and the moon rose into the sky. i felt excited watching them, thrilled by their skill and translucence, speed, agility and mystery.

i wanted to be analytical about what i was seeing, so at first i wondered if the lights were searchlights. i did not see any beams. i only saw the balls zipping and circling about. they were not the lights from normal aircraft. i wondered if they were being projected from a ship/boat but as the lights were above my head and my house in on a hill half a mile from the edge of the bay.  the fact that it went on for so long i found especially amazing. 

i am not a ufo buff. so i am not sure of the correct vernacular to use to describe what i saw. i have done an internet search wondering if anyone else saw what i saw. but i have found nothing thus far.
content.summary: Dozens of transparent spheres of light circling and criss crossing in the cloud layer moving at very high speeds

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i went to the official opening of an ecopark called sijil noh h inside a forestal reserve called much kanan kaax in the state of quintana roo, mexico.. about 135 miles south of the city of cancun. we went there and spent some 4 hours. we took a boat tour around the lake and took pictures of the magnificent landscape, of course we took pictures of our captain. later, while checking the photos my friend noticed something in some of the pictures i took with my camera (lumix 10 mpx). it appears to be a sphere above the forest but no to far from where we were. i must say that in the opening event there were no balloons thrown to the sky. the object was not visible with naked eye only on camera. this is the second time it happens to me to photograph a sphere in this zone of mexico, the firt report is thi one (http://mufoncms.Com/cgi-bin/manage_sighting_reports.Pl?Mode=view_long_desc&id=16319&rnd=935531247690778)
content.summary: Sphere above the jungle near a lake

content.detailedDescription: I noticed what i thought was a star in the sky. my balcony faces the north, the object was seen to the north east. the object seemed to be too bright to be a star and also too low in the sky.  it did't seem to be moving though so i was content to believe it was a star.  then i saw intermittent flashes of light that were very bright and were not strobes.  i decided to film it at this point, as soon as i started to film the object it started to move. it seemed to go up and to the right, growing dimmer as it went. it grew so dim that you couldn't see it anymore, then suddenly it lit back up to a very bright state. at first i thought the object was fading off into the horizon, but that was not the case as it had become so bright again. the motion was slow and smooth, it didn't make any quick movements.  after moving up and to the right for 10 minutes it then reversed the path of its motion and started moving down and to the left.  i observed the object for 30 minutes, when i went to sleep it was still there in the sky.
content.summary: Green sphere ufo over dallas

content.detailedDescription:
myself and 2 others were outside to see the international space station pass over. (wlwt news out of cincinnati announced when this would happen.)  we saw the iss pass over right on schedule, from the sw to ne...Visibility was perfect. after the iss had passed, about 1 to 2 minutes later a 2nd "satellite" like object was on a very similar orbital path that the iss was on. this object was also star like, but about one third the brightness of iss. it had a more bluish color than the brilliant white of the iss. the speed appeared to be similar or possibly a bit faster. the iss was still barely visible to the ne.
  it seems that the iss wouldn't be intentionally put in the same orbit as a satellite, so could this have been a resupply craft ?  are resupply craft ever unmanned as it would take some pretty precise manuvering to get close enough to iss to transfer supplies ?  the shuttle is still on the ground due to storm related launch delays at this time.
  we observed both objects through binoculars. we did not see any navigation lights or strobes as a plane would have... any ideas what this may have been ?
  we lost site of the objects as they continued ne. it wasn't by any means spectacular, but was quite interesting. i'm not saying what it was or wasn't, i'm just asking if you folks know...
content.summary: Whatever was following the iss about 2 minutes behind it.

content.detailedDescription:
07/14/09 my son and i went into the backyard about 15:20 to throw baseball, he had a game later in the afternoon and wanted to warm up. while out throwing, we always hear aircraft in the sky, since there is airports near-by, and tend to look up at them briefly when we hear them. on this occasion though it sounded like an "swooshing" jet engine noise in the sky that abruptly stopped. i was looking around in the sky for the plane, when to the east i saw what at first looked like a brownish red balloon. when i realized it was too round to be a balloon, the object "leveled off" and seemed to reflect in the sun as rotated up and headed north-northeast. no sound was coming from the object. i called to my son, pointing and following the object in the sky. we watched as this object with no sound or a vapor trail sped out of view faster than anything i have ever seen. 
   i am a veteran of the usmc that was stationed on airfields during my service. i have seen a lot of military aircraft. this was something that i have never seen before. thought about calling local media just to see if anyone else had seen this, but at time felt i would be ridiculed and embarrassed. my son seen it after it leveled off, but seen it speed away.
content.summary: Seen round brownish-red object in sky before it leveled off and with no sound, sped away at an incredible rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out side and was watching the clouds roll over, i seen a small dark sphere overhead and under the clouds, the first thing i thought was a bird riding the wind and when i watched more i found there is no way a bird is going to hover there for that long. when it was hovering there i was watching the clouds go by it and it never moved, i grabed my binocs and found it was not a bird but a dark matalic ball and at that point i ran inside to grab my camera and wouldent you guess it was gone, seeing enough footage of the balls above mexico city it looked the same.
content.summary: Dark silver sphere

content.detailedDescription: I went outside with my girlfriend to smoke a cigerette and i looked up and this bright light that was solid not flashing bigger thana plane showed up flew overhead with no sound or any type of tail to signify burners or meteorite flew directly over our head my girlfriend ran inside got my sister by the time she came out she only caught a few seconds glimpse as it dissapeared in the east.It moved in a straight line there was no dought as soon as i seen it i knew what it was and my girlfriend verifyed it.My heart was racing i was excited.
content.summary: Came out of the west was a solid bright light me my sister my girlfriend and i all seen it flew over head and dissapeared in the east.

content.detailedDescription: I was observing the moon overhead and a nearby planet (jupiter, i think) in the western sky when i noticed a small (or very high) bright white star-like object moving west to east, in a straight line and silently, on roughly the same plane as the planet i was observing but below the moon and approximately 75 degrees above the horizon. i instantly identified it, based my personal observations and previous experiences, as a near-earth orbiting object such as the shuttle that is currently in orbit or a satellite. after it had traversed about 3/4 of the viewable sky it made an instant 90 degree turn south and increased speed by at least 4-5 times it's original rate and disappeared behind the treeline. i felt very shocked and disoriented by the sudden course change as i had already dismissed it as a readily identifiable object. there is no question in my mind that this was not a meteor, conventional aircraft, satellite or terrestrial spacecraft. nothing i know moves like that. the entire event encompassed no more than forty seconds, but i stood, staring at the sky, for several more minutes trying to comprehend or rationalize what i had just seen. it didn't work. it was my first sighting and although i always believed i wanted to see a ufo before this happened, i almost wish i had not seen it at all. it has fundamentally changed what i thought i knew about life and the universe around me and i will never again look into the night sky without thinking about this event. ok, i believe now.
content.summary: White star-like object moves west to east then south after a 90 degree turn.
